pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# docspecThis Python packages provides* A library to (de-) serialize Docspec conformat JSON payloads* A CLI to validate and introspect such payloadsExample:```pyimport docspec, sysfor module in docspec.load_modules(sys.stdin): module.members = [member for member in module.members if member.docstring] docspec.dump_module(sys.stdout)``````$ docspec module.json --dump-treemodule docspec| class Location| | data filename| | data lineno| class Decoration| | data name# ...```The `docspec` Python module requires Python 3.5 or newer.---
